header.title: Invite a friend
header.description: This mods enables your users to send emails to their friends and advice them of your board. Also enables registration-keys which must be entered to register and can only be obtained by 'Invite a friend'-emails.

action-group.diy-instructions:
Purge the cache and browse to your SYSTEM-tab -> Administration Control Panel. Browse to your favourite category, select 'Invite a friend' from the dropdown-menu (on the right side), add the module and enable it. (Repeat this process with 'Invitation log' from the dropdown menu). Browse to -> User Control Panel (menu on the left hand side), enter UCP_INVITE, press the 'Create new module'-button and enable the module. Browse to the category just added (UCP->Invite a friend) and add 'Compose invitation' from the dropdown menu. Browse to PERMISSIONS-tab, select Groups' permissions->Registered users->Misc and assign the permission to send invitations.
(images can be found in /contrib/install-folder)
